turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order some pizza from Lotsa Motsa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which location. I would assume but you've ordered from both before.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order it from the Springville location?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can. I'll call and see what their specials are and get back with you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. I'm thinking I will want Pizza and maybe those twisty bread things. What are they called?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have cinnamon bread with frosting for dipping sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is what I want!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a special that's two large pizza's and you get to choose three toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do that special and add an order of the cinnamon bread please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What three toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One the first one I want, green peppers, pepperoni, & pineapple. And the second one, sausage, olives and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any drinks or dipping sauces?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need four ranch dressings and that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I'll place your order right now. You want two large three topping pizza's and an order of cinnamon bread right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thanks. Let me know how much it will cost and when it will be ready for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be 28.65. It will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I need to give you my payment info?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, you already have an account with them.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh OK, thanks. Can you send me a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A receipt will be sent to your phone through a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Again! Bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye!
